page.title: 08Whisky Distilling,Montrose.
page.content: There are two{whisky distilleries}in the area, Lochside Distillery, {Montrose}and Glenesk Distillery and Maltings,{Hillside.}Lochside Distillery produces scotch Highland Malt Whisky and Blends and bottles the "Sandy Macnab" Scotch Whisky. Their whisky is sold in the U.K. and all over the world. Scottish Malt Distillers Ltd. own Glenesk Distillery which was established in 1898 using the water from the North Esk and best barleys from Angus and the Mearns. "Vat 69" was produced at Glenesk as well as a small amount of a single malt whisky up until early 1985. The Distillery is now{closed}but the maltings continue to operate and remain one of the biggest in the country. As well as producing malt for the whisky industry,{new markets}are being investigated.
